A

tag must not contain any tags.
input: Nutrition impacts performance. Vitamins are essential. Balanced meals support health.
evaluation:
```html

Nutrition impacts performance. Vitamins and minerals are crucial for robust physical and mental performance.

Vitamins are essential. They play an important role in maintaining energy levels, immune function, and overall health.

Balanced meals support health. Including a variety of food groups ensures we get all the nutrients necessary for optimal health.

```
